name: Ice vs Ice
description:
Epic Game Jam 2020 Solo Entry

Pre-made assets used:

Ultra Dynamic Sky

Ice Cool Material Pack

vt322 Font from Google

Gamepad/Mouse/WASD+shift to control

Try to fly as low as possible to gain speed!

Procedural map generation. Blueprints only. Sorry for the bugs and poor optimization.

Gameplay video: https://youtu.be/jgrtNbbRnbw
